attributes.additional_details:
Patients though out the World ,with various illnesses are benefiting from using Cannabis.Doctors and medical consultants through out this country are (off the record) sometimes advising the use of Cannabis to patients for various illness`s...Yet any one seeking what can be the only safe medicine for there condition,live in fear of being arrested.
As a Medical Marijuana user ,the law should be on your side,not against you if that substance aids or benefits your ill health.
